node.statement: CLEAN REFORMULATION. The target 1/||h||^2 >= 1/||u||^2 + 1/||v||^2 is equivalent to: (||u||^2 - ||h||^2)(||v||^2 - ||h||^2) >= ||h||^4. Proof: Let A = ||u||^2 - ||h||^2, B = ||v||^2 - ||h||^2. Then ||u||^2*||v||^2 = (||h||^2+A)(||h||^2+B) = ||h||^4 + (A+B)||h||^2 + AB. The RHS of target: ||h||^2(||u||^2+||v||^2) = ||h||^2(2||h||^2+A+B) = 2||h||^4 + (A+B)||h||^2. So LHS-RHS = AB - ||h||^4. Equivalently: (Phi_n(p) - Phi_n(r))(Phi_n(q) - Phi_n(r)) >= Phi_n(r)^2. Note: EQUALITY holds at n=2 (verified: A = 2(d-c)^2/((b-a)^2*D), B = 2(b-a)^2/((d-c)^2*D) where D=(b-a)^2+(d-c)^2, AB = 4/D^2 = Phi_2(r)^2).
